ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectNorthern Pipeline Agency Cost Recovery Charge Remisson Order, 2017
PrecisREMISSION ORDER which remits to Foothills Pipe Lines Ltd. the amount of $5,315,360, representing the amount by which the payments made by it pursuant to the Northern Pipeline Act exceed the cost incurred by the Northern Pipeline Agency.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2018-0027 Publication Date: 2018-03-21
